lead_paragraph: New information about a Moroccan man arrested in Italy this week has raised questions about his whereabouts and the depth of his possible involvement in the March 18 assault.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Italy: Questions About a Suspect
headline.main: Mystery Shrouds Movements of Suspect in Tunisia Museum Attack

snippet: New information about a Moroccan man arrested in Italy this week has raised questions about his whereabouts and the depth of his possible involvement in the March 18 assault.
abstract: Character witnesses in Italy come forward to vouch for whereabouts of Tunisian man Abdelmajid Touil, who was arrested by Italian authorities in connection with March terrorist attack on National Bardo Museum in Tunis.
